problem.markdown:
1. ________ are the terminals which connect the consumer�s terminals to the distributors
() None () Distributors (x) Service mains () Feeders
2. _________ is a device which is used to switch from one bus to the other without any interruption in power supply and without creating hazardous arcs.
(x) Bus coupler () Circuit breaker () Isolator () Any of the them
3. Choose the proper set of increases order of mechanical strength of the following line supports :
() Wooden poles > steel towers > steel poles > R.C.C poles () Wooden poles > steel poles > steel towers > R.C.C poles (x) Wooden poles > steel poles >R.C.C poles > steel towers () Wooden poles > R.C.C poles >steel poles > steel towers
4. A ______ is a substation which does not contain transformers and operates only at a single voltage level.
() Distribution substation () Transmission substation (x) Switching substation () All
5. Gas Insulated Switchgear (GIS) offers
() High reliability, higher safety and maintenance free feature in much larger space compared with conventional switchgear. () High reliability, lower stability and maintenance free feature in much larger space compared with conventional switchgear. (x) High reliability, higher safety and maintenance free feature in much smaller space compared with conventional switchgear. () High reliability, lower safety and maintenance free feature in much smaller space compared with conventional switchgear.
problem.p: 1. ________ are the terminals which connect the consumer�s terminals to the distributors
2. _________ is a device which is used to switch from one bus to the other without any interruption in power supply and without creating hazardous arcs.
3. Choose the proper set of increases order of mechanical strength of the following line supports :

choicegroup.choice: Wooden poles > steel towers > steel poles > R.C.C poles
Wooden poles > steel poles > steel towers > R.C.C poles
Wooden poles > steel poles >R.C.C poles > steel towers
Wooden poles > R.C.C poles >steel poles > steel towers

problem.p: 4. A ______ is a substation which does not contain transformers and operates only at a single voltage level.

choicegroup.choice: High reliability, higher safety and maintenance free feature in much larger space compared with conventional switchgear.
High reliability, lower stability and maintenance free feature in much larger space compared with conventional switchgear.
High reliability, higher safety and maintenance free feature in much smaller space compared with conventional switchgear.
High reliability, lower safety and maintenance free feature in much smaller space compared with conventional switchgear.
